post.body: /guardians/ Wow! Congratulations! That is a truly awesome thing that you're doing for Dalton.
/WP upgrade/ The upgrade has lots of eye candy and is a surprising change for a dot something change. It's a good change.
/WordPress/ What version are you converting from? The WP Automatic Upgrade plugin has been SOOOO nice to have in the hip pocket.
Of course, I'm often accused of being a silly, silly man. Should I really listen to my wife though?!? ;)
/snow is fragile/ But it is fragile. It sublimates even. In Rochester you're just replenishing it at good rate.
/outdoor hockey/ Is that on TV right now? What channel?
/snow video/ Thanks! I might need a new plastic sled tho, from sledding into the dry road. :P
Doing a water change on fish tank, then repair EXT3 file system in 9 y/o Linux laptop. I think he's powering off hard. No desert 4U !!! :D
Won tennis match 6-3,7-5. New rackets worked fine.
Off to play my tennis match. Wish me luck.
Making tons of adjustments to the shipping modules to account for the new 2009 rates.
Back from archery practice. Bad weather kept most kids away, but we had a couple of new kids and they had a great time learning to shoot.
Tennis rained out ... after squeegeeing courts. We'll see about archery practice.
Good morning everyone. A little work, tennis match, archery practice. Why do I fill up my day too much? Naps are nice too!
Archery club practice resumes tomorrow assuming that the rain holds off. Can't wait to see all of the kids again.
Clients shopping cart went live today. So much still left to do on it. So far, so good but it's unnaturally quiet.
Rain is melting my snow. Ah well. That's why snow is special, because its fragile and fleeting.
Changed my Vista desktop to higher contrast. It was bugging my eyes out.
Good morning everyone! 40F this morning.
Video of my 13yo son Logan and my dog Gala playing in the snow. http://tinyurl.com/6wvcq5 No video of my 9yo son Griffin or wife. Wimps! :D
